Should I uninstall 6u7, or just change my environment variables?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2008, 06:01:04 am[/size][hr]I have tried using Java 6u6, but I still can not compile, or run my server. Can someone please help me?

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

I am currently having problems compiling. I am getting the unknown javac error. This is the compiler that I am using.

@echo off color 0b title SERVER NAME Compiler @echo ---------------------- @echo --Initiating Compile-- @echo ---------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java @echo ---------------------- @echo --Compiling complete-- @echo ---------------------- @echo off title SERVER NAME server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m server

I have JDK, and JRE 6u7, and I have properly set my environment variables, so that is not the problem.

So, I have the latest JDK and JRE, set environment variables, and I am using a working compiler. Is there anything else I should do?

Read full topic
